Description:
Telecom service provider (including native and 
        over-the-top VoIP services)

A sensor-based service provider, especially 
        vehicle based

An emergency service provider conveying information 
        to another emergency service provider

An emergency-call-specific modality translation service, 
        e.g., for sign language

An interpretation service, e.g., video relay for sign 
        language interpretation
Any other type of service provider
